text: Anisuzzaman (18 February 1937 â€“ 14 May 2020) was a Bangladeshi academic of Bengali literature. He was born in Calcutta, Bengal Presidency, British India. He was an activist who took part in the Language Movement (1952). He was a member of the Planning Commission to the Government of Bangladesh during the Bangladesh liberation war and a member of the National Education Commission. He was made a National Professor by the Government of Bangladesh in 2018. Anisuzzaman died on 14 May 2020 in Dhaka of kidney and heart disease, aged National Professor Anisuzzaman no more ==References== Category:1937 births Category:2020 deaths Category:Deaths from kidney disease Category:Deaths from heart disease Category:Bangladeshi writers
title: Anisuzzaman
